title: Why everyone suddenly switched to Signal
description:
The most downloaded app in the Apple or Google app stores right now is the encrypted messaging app, Signal. Recode’s Rani Molla explains the three reasons why there’s been a sudden uptick in downloads and why people seem to trust it more than WhatsApp.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

itunes:subtitle: How private is the app and will it stay that way?
